servicesWeOffer.headline: Services We Offer
servicesWeOffer.description: When you refill, transfer prescription or schedule essential healthcare services through our platform, you're connecting with our trusted local independent pharmacies near you. Together, we're strengthening our communities and helping independent pharmacies thrive.

services.description: We deliver your prescriptions to your home or workplace.

ourStory.headline: Our Story
ourStory.description_1st: We started Optimus Health Solutions with a simple belief that no one should have to struggle to get their prescriptions, and no community should lose its trusted local independent pharmacy.
ourStory.description_2nd: By connecting patients with nearby independent pharmacies, we make care faster, more personal, and closer to home.

values.title: Community First
values.description: Support and strengthen mom-and-pop pharmacy stores for healthier communities.

values.title: Patient Empowerment
values.description: Make access simple. Give people the power to choose their pharmacy with respect, privacy, reliability in every interaction.

values.title: Partnership and Transparency
values.description: Co-design solutions with partner pharmacies to build trust and shared success.

readyToExperience.title: Ready to experience the convenience of Optimus Heath Solutions
readyToExperience.description: Join thousands of satisfied patients who trust us with their prescription delivery needs.

banner.title: "How It Works" - Simple, Secure and Local
banner.description: We handle the coordination so you can focus on your health, while your trusted local pharmacy takes care of the rest

howItWorks.headline: Prescription Delivery

steps.title: Request Delivery
steps.description: Our team will contact your pharmacy to refill your prescriptionsSimply use our platform to request delivery in minutes. Select pharmacy location, your delivery address, day and time of delivery. You can create an account for easy process or checkout as guest

steps.title: Get it Delivered
steps.description: Relax! Once the pharmacy receives and confirms fulfilment for pickup. We will deliver your prescription to your home, workplace, or any location of your choice quickly (in minutes), securely, and conveniently

howItWorks.message: Whether you're refilling, transferring, or scheduling care, Optimus HS connects you directly with your trusted local pharmacy to make it fast, reliable, and stress-free

descriptionOfProcess.title: Refill Prescription
descriptionOfProcess.description: When you need a refill? Simply submit your refill request through our platform. We'll connect with your selected local pharmacy to process it quickly. Once filled, you'll get an instant update to track or schedule your delivery right to your doorstep.

descriptionOfProcess.title: Transfer Prescription
descriptionOfProcess.description: It only takes a minute to transfer your prescription from your old pharmacy to your preferred local one. We'll securely send your details to the new pharmacy and confirm the transfer within a day. Once it's ready, you'll be notified to schedule your delivery wherever and whenever you need it.

descriptionOfProcess.title: Schedule Essential Healthcare Services
descriptionOfProcess.description: Easily schedule vaccinations, health screenings, or wellness consultations at your preferred local pharmacy. We'll coordinate your appointment details and confirm your slot instantly. It's convenient, community-based care -handled securely and at no extra cost to you.

benefit.title: See all our Benefits
benefits: Zero cost to deliver Rx when using our partner pharmacies

banner.title: For Independent Pharmacies
banner.description: Grow your pharmacy’s reach and deliver medicines seamlessly to your customers.

benefits.title: Fast & Reliable Delivery
benefits.description: Deliver prescriptions quickly and reliably to your customers with our efficient delivery network.

benefits.title: HIPAA Compliant
benefits.description: Ensure patient data security and compliance with HIPAA regulations through our secure platform.

benefits.title: Data Insights
benefits.description: Access valuable analytics and insights to understand your customer base and optimize operations.

benefits.title: Increase Revenue
benefits.description: Expand your customer reach and grow revenue by offering convenient delivery services to more patients.

independentPharmacies.headline: Benefits of Joining Our Network
independentPharmacies.description: As an Optimus partner, you’ll attract new customers, improve medication adherence, and compete effectively with large chain pharmacies while staying connected to your local community.

steps.title: Upload necessary licenses
steps.description: Provide valid pharmacy licenses and certifications.

steps.title: Start receiving delivery requests
steps.description: Manage and Fulfil delivery requests through our platform.

formSection.headline: Get Started Today
formSection.description: Join our growing network of trusted local independent pharmacies delivering care directly to patients' doors. As an Optimus partner, you'll attract new customers, improve medication adherence, and compete effectively with large chain pharmacies while staying connected to your local community.

form.formDescription: Complete the Interest Form  and we'll contact you to schedule for a brief onboarding call to walk you through the process.

banner.title: Earn with Every Delivery
banner.description: Join the community of independent courier drivers supporting local pharmacies and helping patients get the prescriptions they need while you .while earning a flexible income.

whyDriveWithUs.headline: Why Drive with Us?
whyDriveWithUs.description: Discover the benefits of joining the Optimus Health Solutions

steps.title: Apply to become a driver
steps.description: Start by completing our short driver application form with your basic information, vehicle type etc.

steps.title: Get verified
steps.description: Our team will contact you with next steps. This process will include background check, driver’s license and insurance verification and vehicle inspection(if applicable), compliance training

steps.title: Get activated and begin earning
steps.description: Once approved, you will get delivery details to pick up Rx from local pharmacies, and deliver them to user’s preferred locations safely, securely and with care.

hipaa.title: HIPAA Policy
hipaa.description: We are committed to protecting the privacy and security of your health information. This policy outlines how we handle your protected health information (PHI) and ensures compliance with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy matters. Learn how we protect your personal data and ensure secure prescription delivery.
